snippet: A growing number of investors are loading up on Greek government securities that mature in March, betting on a rescue that would provide them with a huge profit.
abstract: Growing number of investors are loading up on Greek government securities that mature in March, when Athens hopes to receive a bailout payment of as much as 30 billion euros ($38 billion) that would provide them with a big profit; investors are taking huge risks as their actions could help discourage the European Union and International Monetary Fund from handing Greece the rescue payment.
lead_paragraph: A growing number of investors are loading up on Greek government securities that mature in March, betting on a rescue that would provide them with a huge profit.
